summary: This mod adds subtle, colorful animations to Gamwich's RUSTIC POTIONS and POISONS.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][size=3][color=#ff0000][size=4][b]This mod is [size=4][b]released [size=4][b][size=4][b]ONLY [/b][/size][/b][/size]on[/b][/size] Nexus. If you see it on other pages it's probably stolen.[/b][/size][/color][color=#ff0000][/color]

After few months of hard work, with the cooperatation of Gamwich, I was finally able to finish the mod you all have been waiting for (well, at least some of you). Without further ado, I would like to present you [/size]
[size=5][b][font=Verdana]RUSTIC ANIMATED POTIONS and POISONS[/font][/b].[/size][/center][/size][size=3]

[youtube]JocaebOWZM4[/youtube][youtube]CTv9h7EJg94[/youtube][/size]

[size=3]The mod adds very subtle, colorful animations to all vanilla potions and poisons (except White Phial). It's meant for vanilla graphic, but it should work with almost any ENB. Visibility of the animations and intensity of the glow depend on many factors, including:[/size]
- in-game time of the day
- use of any lightening mods
- any light sources
- use of ENB  etc.
[size=3]If you feel the effects are too strong or too weak, you can try to use one of the optional files. With some ENBs animations are not visible during the night or they are not visible at all.
This mod is totally independent from my original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75492/?]Pretty Animated Potions and Poisons[/url] mod, so if you want to use RUSTIC ANIMATED POTIONS and POISONS instead, you should uninstall the original mod first.

You can find original Gamwich mod here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62701/?]RUSTIC POTIONS and POISONS
[/url]
[/size]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]INSTALLATION: [/size][/color]
Put the main file in your Data folder. Choose optional file (if you want to use one) and also put in your Data folder, overwrite files if asked.

[color=#00ff00][size=4]COMPATIBILITY:
[color=#ffffff][size=2]The mod is NOT COMPATIBLE with anything that changes vanilla potions' meshes and textures (excluding White Phial). It is compatible with any mod that adds new potions, as long as they use vanilla meshes (the potions with custom meshes and textures will just have their original look without animations).

[color=#00ff00][size=4]FAQ:[/size][/color]
[size=3]1. Will you make a CACO patch?[/size]
[/size][/color][/size][/color]      No. The mod is just a retexture, like original Gamwich mod.

[size=3]2. Is there a chance that you will make a thick glass bottles version?[/size]
      I tried and it didn't look good. I think the mod already looks perfect as it is.

[size=3]3. I barely can see the animations.
[size=2]      Well, the description says "very subtle". If you don't like it, you can try one of the optional files. [/size][/size]

[color=#00ff00][size=4]CREDITS:[/size][/color]
[b][size=3]Gamwich[/size][/b] for permission to use his wonderful textures, and for all the help in creating this mod.

[size=4][color=#ff0000]VERSION 1.1:[/color]
[/size][size=2]- USLEEP fix for frostbite venom (incorrect havok material)
- improved RUSTIC textures with AO
[/size]- slightly thicker poisons' bottles
- much thicker frostbite venom bottle

[size=3]MY OTHER POTIONS MODS:

author: dailyplanet and Gamwich
